attributes.description:
Superb Interior and Exterior Condition. 
Complete Motus 101 Quality Checks completed on every vehicle.
All vehicles are sold with a complete service history.
Finance options are available from our dealership.
Optional extended warranties and service plans are available. 
We assist with accessory fitments such as smash and grab, tracker etc.
Price excludes dealer on the road fees. 
Mileage might have changed since time of when ad was placed. Nationwide delivery service 
available on request.  Trade ins are welcome.

attributes.title: 2020 Mazda CX-5 2.2 DE Akera Auto AWD

attributes.description:
The Venue is one of Hyundai's latest additions to their line-up. At under 4 metres long, it is a compact SUV, which means that you're getting the SUV experience, but without the parking difficulties and high fuel consumption. The Venue is a fantastic package, with surprisingly great interior space, lots of oomph from the 1.0L turbocharged engine, low fuel consumption and a sumptuous ride. This Venue is also equipped with a 7 speed DCT (Dual Clutch Transmission) gearbox, that operates just like an auto, but with greater performance and lower fuel consumption than a manual - The best of both worlds! 

Balance of Hyundai's unrivalled warranty of 7 years / 200'000km and a 3 year / 45'000km service plan.

Don't Miss Out, Call Us Today, or Leave Your Details and We Will Call You.

Finance Can Be Arranged, Nationwide Delivery, Trade-ins Welcome.

Price Excludes Documentation and Registration Costs E&OE

As one of the many MOTUS Select Pre-owned dealerships, we pride ourselves in excellent service and offer vehicles that can be trusted and enjoyed. Customer satisfaction is our main priority! 

MOTUS: Live, Love, Drive.

ONLY CASH AND EFT
TRADE INS ACCEPTED 
STRICTLY NO FINANCE

WE HAVE 3 BRANCHES FOR YOUR CONVENIENCE PLEASE CONTACT US TO CONFIRM LOCATION OF YOUR DESIRED VEHICLE!

 

MONDAY TO FRIDAY: 8AM TO 5PM
SATURDAY:8AM TO 1PM








































THIS IS AN AUTHENTIC AD WITH A REPUTABLE DEALER. PLEASE BE AWARE OF SCAMS WITH FRAUDSTERS USING OTHER ADVERTISERS PHOTO’S. DO NOT PAY OVER ANY DEPOSIT’S UNLESS YOU HAVE CONFIRMED THE VEHICLE EXISTS DUE TO EXTENSIVE FRAUD!!
